alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cherry County through 600 PM CDT/500 PM MDT/... At 527 PM CDT/427 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Merritt Reservoir, or 33 miles southwest of Valentine, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merritt Reservoir and Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 97 between mile markers 118 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
